reviewText:
I see alot of people buying dvds here saying they can't play them. have you people ever thought about buying multi-region dvd players, they sellthem here on amazon for pretty cheap. I got one and can buy all region DVDs with no problems.
oh  I have seen this movie, big fan of these slocky movies....
I bought this movie knowing that it wouldn't play in my region 1 player, simply because the cover is so badass. In it's badassery, the DVD was everything I'd hoped for.
